hero.tagline: Learn with PollyTalkie, Talk like a native! Language learning reimagined: Natural conversations, real-world scenarios, personalized to you.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied language learners worldwide

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: PollyTalkie has completely transformed my Spanish learning journey. The AI conversations feel incredibly natural, and I've made more progress in 3 months than I did in 2 years of traditional classes!

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: As someone who struggled with language learning anxiety, PollyTalkie has been a game-changer. I can practice French without the fear of judgment, and the personalized feedback has helped me correct pronunciation issues I didn't even know I had.

items.name: Emma Rodriguez
items.text: The value for money is incredible! I was spending $60 per hour with a tutor, but now I practice Japanese daily for a fraction of the cost. The specialized vocabulary topics in the Unlimited plan are perfect for my business needs.

items.name: David Kim
items.text: I've tried every language app out there, and PollyTalkie is by far the most effective. The AI adapts to my learning style and challenges me at just the right level. My German has improved dramatically in just weeks!

items.name: Sophia Patel
items.text: The 24/7 support is fantastic! Whenever I have questions about my learning path or technical issues, the team responds quickly. The dedicated consultant in the Unlimited plan has helped me create a perfect study schedule.

items.name: Lucas Moreau
items.text: As a language teacher myself, I'm impressed by the pedagogical approach of PollyTalkie. The way it integrates grammar naturally into conversations is brilliant. I now recommend it to all my students!

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to PollyTalkie ("we", "our", or "us"). By accessing or using our language learning platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). Please read these Terms carefully before using our services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: PollyTalkie provides an AI-powered language learning platform that enables users to practice conversations and improve their language skills. Our services include but are not limited to:

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To access certain features of our platform, you must create an account. You agree to:
userAccounts.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
userAccounts.item3: Promptly update any changes to your information
userAccounts.item4: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

userConduct.title: 4. User Conduct
userConduct.content: When using our services, you agree not to:
userConduct.item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
userConduct.item4: Attempt to disrupt or compromise our systems
userConduct.item5: Use our services for unauthorized commercial purposes

payments.title: 5. Payment Terms
payments.content: By subscribing to our premium services, you agree to the following payment terms:
payments.item1: Payment is due at the time of subscription and will be automatically renewed unless canceled.
payments.item2: We offer refunds within 7 days of subscription if you are not satisfied with our services.
payments.item3: Prices are subject to change, but we will notify you before applying any changes to your subscription.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content and materials available through our services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, and software, are the property of PollyTalkie or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.item1: Copy or reproduce our content without permission
intellectualProperty.item3: Distribute or publicly display our content
intellectualProperty.item4: Remove any copyright or proprietary notices

userContent.title: 7. User Content
userContent.content: By submitting content to our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display your content for the purpose of providing our services.
userContent.item1: You retain all ownership rights to your content.
userContent.item2: You are solely responsible for the content you submit.
userContent.item3: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable.

prohibitedActivities.title: 8. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: When using our services, you agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:
prohibitedActivities.item1: Violating any applicable laws or regulations.
prohibitedActivities.item2: Infringing upon the intellectual property rights of others.
prohibitedActivities.item3: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems or user accounts.
prohibitedActivities.item4: Using our services to transmit malware or other harmful code.
prohibitedActivities.item5: Engaging in any activity that disrupts or interferes with our services.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.item1: Suspend or terminate accounts for violations
termination.item2: Modify or discontinue services with notice
termination.item3: Remove content that violates these Terms

disclaimer.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that our services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure.
disclaimer.item1: Services will be uninterrupted or error-free
disclaimer.item2: Specific language learning outcomes will be achieved
disclaimer.item3: Content will be accurate or complete

limitationOfLiability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, PollyTalkie shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes through:

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in San Francisco County, California.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 123 Language Lane, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

international.intro: Your information may be transferred and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers, including:

pricing.title: Affordable Language Learning & Practicing
pricing.subtitle: Practice with PollyTalkie at a fraction of human tutor costs

addOn.title: Need more practice time?
addOn.description: Add more learning hours to your monthly plan
addOn.pricePerUnit: for extra 8 learning hours per month
addOn.upgradeHint: For more than 40 learning hours monthly, consider the Aggressive package for better value
addOn.faqQuestion: I chose the Regular package, but I want more practice time. What can I do?
addOn.faqAnswer: You have two options: purchase add-on time in 8-hour increments per month, or upgrade to our Aggressive package for more included time.

features.feature2: Only $3 per hour (compared to $25-$70 for human tutors)
Less than $2 per hour (compared to $25-$70 for human tutors)

school.name: School/Organization
school.description: Custom solutions for educational institutions and businesses

features.feature1: Custom pricing based on usage needs

faq.question1: How does the 7-day free trial work?
faq.answer1: You can try the Regular plan for 7 days completely free. No credit card required to start your language learning journey!
faq.question2: How do your prices compare to human tutors?
faq.answer2: Human language tutors typically charge $25-$70 per hour. PollyTalkie provides the same practice benefits at just $2-$3 per hour, making language learning more accessible.
faq.answer3: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.question4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer4: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay for subscription payments.

footer.tagline: Built with ❤️ for language learners worldwide

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: PollyTalkie is dedicated to breaking down language barriers through advanced AI technology, making language learning more natural, efficient, and enjoyable. We believe everyone should have the opportunity to learn new languages, explore new cultures, and expand their horizons.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.content: Our platform combines cutting-edge natural language processing technology and speech recognition systems to provide an immersive language learning experience. By engaging in real conversations with our AI assistants, users can practice their language skills in practical contexts, receive immediate feedback, and progress at their own pace.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: PollyTalkie is made up of professionals passionate about language learning and artificial intelligence. Our team includes linguists, software engineers, AI researchers, and education specialists working together to create the best language learning solutions.

values.title: Our Values
values.innovationDesc: Continuously exploring new technologies and methods to enhance the language learning experience.
values.inclusivityDesc: Creating learning tools that work for everyone, regardless of background or ability.
values.qualityDesc: Committed to providing the highest quality language learning content and technology.
values.communityDesc: Fostering a global community of language learners and promoting cultural exchange.

joinUs.title: Join Our Journey
joinUs.content: We invite you to join our language learning revolution. Whether you're looking to learn a new language or improve your existing skills, PollyTalkie provides the tools and support you need. Start your language learning journey and explore new possibilities today!

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.content: We'd love to hear from you with any feedback, questions, or suggestions. Fill out the form and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you soon.
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
